## BaseClientOptions.debugBuf property

If `true`<!-- -->, all sent and received raw buffer would be print into the log. It may be useful when you do something for buffer encryption/decryption, and want to debug them.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
debugBuf?: boolean;
```
